titles.title: To require the Administrator of the Federal Railroad Administration to conduct an evaluation of the safety, security, and environmental risks of transporting liquefied natural gas by rail, and for other purposes.
Protecting Communities from Liquefied Natural Gas Trains Act
Protecting Communities from Liquefied Natural Gas Trains Act
Protecting Communities from Liquefied Natural Gas Trains Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.
